entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight then to 70 gusting to 90 before morning. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing in the morning. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then clearing. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
